name: Validate e-mail addresses by MailerCheck and create new customers in WooCommerce for new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheet, Make will automatically validate the email address by MailerCheck and create new customer in WooCommerce. The example uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Dy6ojlUqe5BX8p754tzkpCahaJ8zuQmem3l77gLR-T8/edit?usp=sharing).
